experiment_name: Gradient Boosting Baseline with Optimized Preprocessing
key_strengths: Met performance target with ROC-AUC of 0.935
Robust hyperparameter optimization achieved optimal configuration
Comprehensive evaluation with 7 diagnostic plots generated
Complete MLflow pipeline created for deployment readiness
main_weaknesses: Class imbalance issues with recall for positive class at 47.07%
Precision-recall performance shows room for improvement despite high ROC-AUC
Limited feature engineering may miss interaction effects and advanced relationships
future_suggestions: Implement class imbalance techniques (SMOTE, class weighting, threshold optimization)
Develop advanced feature engineering with interactions and domain-specific features
Explore ensemble methods for enhanced performance
Optimize prediction threshold for specific business requirements

context_for_next_iteration.main_opportunities: Minority class detection improvement and advanced feature engineering
context_for_next_iteration.technical_foundation: Solid preprocessing pipeline ready for enhancement
context_for_next_iteration.business_context: Model reliably identifies high-probability targets but may miss ~53% of potential subscribers
